frame.name: Building_subparts
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame includes words that name subparts of buildings that can be occupied by people.
<ex>Mary left the <fex name="Building_part"><t>room</t></fex> in a huff.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Building_part
FE.definition: <def-root>The place or area specified inside a structure. The <fen>Building_part</fen> of the <fen>Whole</fen>. <ex>She works in the cancer <fex name="Building_part"><t>ward</t></fex> of the local hospital.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Whole
FE.definition: <def-root>The entirety of a building whose <fen>Building_part</fen> is discussed. <ex>I live on the sixth <t>floor</t> <fex name="Whole">of the building</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which the <fen>Building_part</fen> was constructed.</def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE designates the kind or <fen>Type</fen> of <fen>Building_part</fen>. <ex>She works in the <fex name="Type">cancer</fex> <t>ward</t> of the local hospital.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes where the <fen>Building_part</fen> is located. <ex>The laundry room is located on the <fex name="Place">lower</fex> <t>level</t> of this building.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>A characterization of some property of the <fen>Building_part</fen>. <ex>The <fex name="Des">enormous</fex> <t>room</t> was filled with light from a number of large windows that overlooked the bay.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: catacombe.n
lexUnit.definition: onder de grond met spelonken, gewelven en groeven

lexUnit.name: portiek.n
lexUnit.definition: voor de ingang van een gebouw

lexUnit.name: veranda.n
lexUnit.definition: aan de voor- of achterkant van een huis

lexUnit.name: appartement.n
lexUnit.definition: in een groot huis of gebouw
